name: page_to_md
description: Firefox extension to save pages as Markdown

scripts._chrome_content: bun build src/content.ts --outdir chrome_build --outfile content.bundle.js --target browser --external chrome --minify --sourcemap
scripts._chrome_background: bun build src/background.ts --outdir chrome_build --outfile background.js --target browser --external chrome --minify --sourcemap
scripts._firefox_content: bun build src/content.ts --outdir firefox_build --outfile content.bundle.js --target browser --external chrome --minify --sourcemap
scripts._firefox_background: bun build src/background.ts --outdir firefox_build --outfile background.js --target browser --external chrome --minify --sourcemap
scripts.build:chrome: bun run _build_chrome && cp manifest.chrome.json chrome_build/manifest.json && cp icons/md-nice.png chrome_build/
scripts.build:firefox: bun run _build_firefox && cp manifest.firefox.json firefox_build/manifest.json && cp icons/md-nice.png firefox_build/
scripts.build: bun run build:chrome && bun run build:firefox

author: extreme4all
